Services.title: Services
Services.intro: Melita Laundry Services delivers end-to-end industrial laundry workflows for healthcare institutions and hotels.
Services.washBody: Industrial washers tailored to textile type and soil level, ensuring hygiene compliance and consistent results.
Services.dryBody: High-capacity industrial dryers with controlled programs that protect textile lifetime while delivering fast turnaround.
Services.ironBody: Roller ironers and finishing equipment providing smooth, repeatable quality for bed linen, terry, and workwear.
Services.packBody: Folding, counting, packaging and labelling flows that hand off linen in a logistics-ready format for your operations.
Services.contractBody: SLA-driven, reportable contract models for public institutions and hotel groups.

Industries.title: Industries Served
Industries.healthcareBody: Melita Laundry Services supports public hospitals and hotels in Hatay with scalable, standardized and auditable laundry services designed around infection control and textile safety.
Industries.hospitalityBody: For hotels and resorts in Antalya, Melita manages room linen, spa textiles and staff garments with capacity planning that adapts to seasonal demand.

Facility.title: Facility & Capacity
Facility.intro: The Reyhanlı / Hatay facility is configured with a machine park and infrastructure built for institutional healthcare and hospitality demand.
washersItems: Industrial washers in multiple kg classes (e.g. 50 kg, 60 kg, 80 kg, 120 kg)
Chemical dosing infrastructure designed for healthcare applications
dryersItems: Temperature and time settings tuned for different textile groups
ironersItems: Wide roller ironers for sheets and duvet covers
Output tables that support folding and stacking
Supporting finishing equipment for towels and workwear
steamItems: Safety systems for pressure and temperature control
waterItems: Water conditioning based on local feedwater quality
Water management that supports operational efficiency
powerItems: Support equipment for textile handling and staging

About.title: About
About.founded: Melita Müteahhitlik was founded with a focus on industrial laundry and facility operations.
About.relocation: In 2025, the company relocated its headquarters to Antalya to be closer to healthcare and hospitality clients.
About.focus: The company operates under the Melita Laundry Services brand with a clear focus on industrial laundry workflows and hygiene standardization.
About.approach: Facility design, machine park configuration, chemistry supply and operational planning are managed together to serve institutional public hospitals and hotels.
